title: time.go: RFC3339 constant incorrect
body:
by **kai.hendry**: 
What steps reproduce the problem?

Open http://golang.org/pkg/time/#pkg-constants

1. RFC3339     = "2006-01-02T15:04:05Z07:00" is incorrect
2. It should be IIUC "2006-01-02T15:04:05-07:00"
3. http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3339.txt says in the ABNF time-offset     = "Z"
/ time-numoffset

What happened?

Not sure, imprecise dates? Perhaps I misunderstood rfc3339.

What should have happened instead?

A clear offset in the rfc3339 golang constant.
